name: sgmweka
short_description:
Weka wrapper for the SGM toolkit for text classification and modeling. Provides Sparse Generative Models for scalable and accurate text classification and modeling for use in high-speed and large-scale text mining. Has lower time complexity of classification than comparable software due to inference based on sparse model representation and use of an inverted index.
The provided .zip file is in the Weka package format, giving access to text classification. Other functions are usable through either Java command-line commands or class inclusion into Java projects.
summary: Weka wrapper for the SGM toolkit for text classification and modeling.
